options.name: Twin Assist
options.description: Helps you to lock and unlock your door lock.

options.name: Hold and Release
options.description: After a unlock operation the lock holds the lock, so the door can be opened
options.overview: 0 - disabled, 1 to 2147483647 - enabled no. of seconds

options.name: Block to block
options.description: The lock will run the motor until it hits resistance.

options.name: BLE Temporary Allowed
options.description: The BLE is enabled for a number of seconds.
options.overview: 0 - Disabled, 1 to 2147483647 - enabled no. of seconds

options.name: BLE Always Allowed
options.overview: 0 - BLE Always disabled, 1 - BLE Always enabled

options.name: Autolock
options.description: Lock after an unlock.Value is delay in sec before lock is locked again.
options.overview: 0 - disabled, 1 to 2147483647 - enabled no. of seconds

associations.name: Lifeline
associations.overview: Z-Wave Plus Lifeline Device Reset Locally: triggered upon reset. Battery/notification: triggered upon low battery. Door Lock operation report: triggered upon a change in door lock Notification: triggered upon a change in door lock
